2019 was when OpenAI LP (capped profit LLC) was founded. In later years, most "OpenAI" staff ceased being employed by the nonprofit. For example, their 2023 Form 990 says OpenAI only has 2 employees. So not clear that the 2019 Form 990 describes all OpenAI staff.
